definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: He devoted all his life to the cause of military aviation.
sentences.chinese: 他把一生都獻給了軍用航空事業。

sentences.english: At that time aviation was still in its infancy.
sentences.chinese: 他的一生都奉獻給了中國的航空事業。

sentences.english: He devoted all his life to China's aviation.
sentences.chinese: 他的一生都奉獻給了中國的航空事業。

sentences.english: Jets are a new development in aviation.
sentences.chinese: 噴氣式飛機是航空事業上的一個新成就。
